name: queer olonkho
description:
Queer is an umbrella term for people who are not heterosexual or are not cisgender.

Olonkho is a series of heroic epic tales of the Yakuts and one of the oldest epic arts of the Turkic peoples.

The Yakuts, or the Sakha are a Turkic ethnic group who mainly live in the Republic of Sakha in the Russian Federation. The Yakuts are native people to Russia.

This project is an interactive interview based on real interviews with LGBTQ people from the Republic of Sakha.

Based on 4 interviews, it is a puzzle where some pieces may not fit together.
